PLActorRPC Class Reference

Provides remote procedure call services. More...

List of all members.

Static Public Member Functions

(id) + sendRPC:toProcess:
 Send the rpcMessage to the given process, and synchronously wait for a response with a matching transaction ID.

Detailed Description

Provides remote procedure call services.

Utilizes the PLActorMessage TransactionID to provide synchronous message passing support.

Member Function Documentation

+ (id) sendRPC: (PLActorMessage *)  rpcMessage
toProcess: (id<PLActorProcess>)  process 

Send the rpcMessage to the given process, and synchronously wait for a response with a matching transaction ID.

Parameters:
rpcMessage Message to send. The messages transactionId will be used to perform a selective receive for the response.
process Process to which the message will be sent.
